70050000008421.name: Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate: Piranha Plant Standalone Fighter
70050000008421.description:
Piranha Plant joins the battle as a stand-alone fighter in the Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate game! With its powerful bite, Poison Breath, and ability to call in Petey Piranha for a larger-than-life Final Smash, this fighter’s ferocity is as sharp as its teeth. Ready your pipes and flowerpots; your opponent won’t see you coming! (Then again, Piranha Plant doesn’t really “see” either. It doesn’t have eyes.)

Players who purchased and registered the game before January 31, 2019 have until June 30, 2019 to redeem their codes and receive Piranha Plant for free. Players who did not qualify for the early purchase bonus can purchase Piranha Plant in the Nintendo eShop for $4.99 USD.

Note: Piranha Plant is not a part of the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass. Therefore, this fighter does not come with a stage or selection of music.

70050000008422.name: Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate: Challenger Pack 1
70050000008422.description:
Joker steals the show when he joins the Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate game as a playable fighter! This speedy fighter from the Persona series wields a knife and a gun to rack up damage. When his Rebellion Gauge is full, Joker summons his Persona, Arsene, to immediately power up his attacks for a limited time. This pack also includes Mementos, a stage that changes colors, depending on which Persona series music track is playing! 

Challenger Pack 1 includes Joker as a playable fighter, his stage, Mementos, and a selection of music from the Persona series. 

Note: The content of this Challenger Pack is already included in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass (sold separately).

70050000008423.name: Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate: Challenger Pack 2
70050000008423.description:
The Hero from DRAGON QUEST® XI joins Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate as a playable fighter!
Wielding the Supreme Sword of Light and a trusty shield, he can slice his foes and block incoming attacks. When Hero pulls up his Command Selection screen, he’ll have access to a random selection of spells that could turn the tide of battle in his favor! This pack also includes the Yggdrasil’s Altar stage, which sweeps across nearby areas around the sacred Tree of Life, as well as a selection of music from the DRAGON QUEST series.

Challenger Pack 2 includes Hero as a playable fighter, his stage, Yggdrasil’s Altar, and a selection of music from the DRAGON QUEST series.

* The content of this Challenger Pack is already included in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass (sold separately).

70050000008424.name: Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate: Challenger Pack 3
70050000008424.description:
The missing piece of the puzzle has been found, as Banjo & Kazooie are joining the battle as a playable fighter! With Banjo’s bare hands to bruise rivals up close and Kazooie’s egg-cellent shooting skills, your rivals will be singing the blues in no time. For their Final Smash, these perfect partners call upon a flock of Jinjos and the Mighty Jinjonator to deal the final blow to any “feeble jerk” that may stand in their way! This pack also includes the Spiral Mountain stage (which umm…spirals!), as well as a selection of music from the Banjo-Kazooie™ series.

Challenger Pack 3 includes Banjo & Kazooie as a playable fighter, their stage, Spiral Mountain, and a selection of music from the Banjo-Kazooie™ series.

Note: The content of this Challenger Pack is already included in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass (sold separately).

70050000008425.name: Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate: Challenger Pack 4
70050000008425.description:
Terry Bogard faces the fury in the Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate game as a new playable fighter! This iconic fighter from the Fatal Fury series of fighting games is the fourth fighter in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass. Using his Power Wave and Burning Knuckle, earn your title as The King of Fighters!

Note: The content of this Challenger Pack is already included in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass (sold separately).

70050000008426.name: Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate: Challenger Pack 5
70050000008426.description:
Byleth is coming to the Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate game as a new playable fighter! This iconic fighter is the fifth fighter in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass. Using the Heroes’ Relics and the Sword of the Creator, represent the and realize their full potential. 

Note: The content of this Challenger Pack is already included in the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass (sold separately).

70050000008427.name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass Bonus Mii Fighter Costume (Rex)
70050000008427.description:
This is a special bonus for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Fighters Pass owners.
It contains the items as follows:
　- Rex Wig
　- Rex Outfit

70050000008428.name: 【Costume】Persona 3 Protagonist Outfit and Wig

This DLC contains the Persona 3 Protagonist Outfit and Wig.

※Once purchased, you can use this from “Games & More” → “Mii Fighters”

70050000008429.name: 【Costume】Persona 4 Protagonist Outfit and Wig

70050000008431.name: 【Costume】Morgana Hat

70050000009021.name: UK English Language Pack
70050000009021.description: Optional downloadable UK English Language Pack for Diablo 3: Eternal Collection on Nintendo Switch.

70050000009321.name: Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes - DLC #1 Black Dandelion
70050000009321.description:
This DLC includes the following:
- Shinobu Jacobs, a new playable character
- 2 unique Skills for Shinobu Jacobs
- New adventure mode starring Badman

70050000009322.name: Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes - DLC #2 - Bubblegum Fatale
70050000009322.description:
This DLC includes the following:
- Bad Girl, a new playable character
- 2 unique Skills for Bad Girl
- Additional game world: "Killer Marathon"
- New Skill
- New adventure mode content for Travis

70050000009585.name: Traditional Chinese Language Pack
70050000009585.description: Optional downloadable Traditional Chinese Language Pack for Diablo 3: Eternal Collection on Nintendo Switch.

70050000009952.name: Korean Language Pack
70050000009952.description: Optional downloadable Korean Language Pack for Diablo 3: Eternal Collection on Nintendo Switch.

70050000010821.name: Captain Toad™: Treasure Tracker – Special Episode (Shifty Shrine)
70050000010821.description: The Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker - Special Episode DLC introduces eighteen new challenges, including five brand-new courses. By purchasing the Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker – Special Episode DLC before March 14th on the Nintendo eShop, you’ll get early access to one of the courses, Shifty Shrine.  The remainder of the courses will be available on March 14th.

70050000010822.name: Captain Toad™: Treasure Tracker - Special Episode
70050000010822.description: The Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker - Special Episode DLC introduces eighteen new challenges, including five brand-new courses. 18 new challenges, including five new courses.

70050000011081.name: Simplified Chinese Language Pack
70050000011081.description: Optional downloadable Simplified Chinese Pack for Diablo 3: Eternal Collection on Nintendo Switch.

70050000011198.name: 【Costume】Tails Outfit and Hat
70050000011198.description:
This DLC contains the Tails Outfit and Hat.

※Once purchased, you can use this from “Games & More” → “Mii Fighters”

70050000011199.name: 【Costume】Knuckles Outfit and Hat
70050000011199.description:
This DLC contains the Knuckles Outfit and Hat.

※Once purchased, you can use this from “Games & More” → “Mii Fighters”

70050000011618.name: Shao Kahn
70050000011618.description:
Play as Shao Kahn, fully playable character.

Emperor of Outworld. For millennia, Shao Kahn dominated the realms, rapidly expanding his Empire by conquest. But when he set out to claim Earthrealm, he was blocked by the rules of Mortal Kombat. Deterred but determined, Shao Kahn demands absolute victory.

70050000011624.name: Cangaceiro Kano
70050000011624.description: A playable skin that reimagines Mortal Kombat 11 Kombatant Kano as a Cangaceiro fighter.

70050000011687.name: Ninja Mime Johnny Cage
70050000011687.description: Players who purchase the Mortal Kombat 11 Kombat Pack receive this exclusive playable Johnny Cage Skin. Ninja Mime, one of actor Johnny Cage's most iconic roles, is legendary in the Mortal Kombat Universe. Ninja Mime Johnny Cage - Silent. But Deadly!

70050000011701.name: Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled - Electron Skins Pack
70050000011701.intro: Crash is back in the driver's seat in Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled!
70050000011701.description:
Includes:

- Electron Skins Pack - - consists of the Crash, Coco & Cortex Electron Skins, each with a unique podium animation

70050000011704.name: Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled - Nitros Oxide Edition Content
70050000011704.intro: Crash is back in the driver's seat in Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled!
70050000011704.description:
The Crash™ Team Racing Nitro-Fueled - Nitros Oxide Edition content includes:

- Nitros Oxide, Crunch, Zem and Zam characters*
- Nitros Oxide Hovercraft kart*
- Exclusive Star Skins Pack: Nitros Oxide, Crash, Coco, Cortex Star Skins with unique podium animations
- Exclusive Crunch Robot Skin with unique podium animation
- Exclusive kart paintjob
- Exclusive kart sticker pack
- Exclusive Hovercraft kart decal

*Also able to be unlocked in standard version of game through in-game challenges and rewards.

70050000011728.name: Shang Tsung
70050000011728.description: Soul Sorcerer and historic host of the Mortal Kombat. Born in Earthrealm, Shang Tsung's relentless pursuit of powerful magic led him to Outworld, where Shao Kahn offered him a dark power that no sorcerer on Earthrealm could. Shang Tsung pledged his eternal loyalty to Shao Kahn in exchange for this evil magic, but he is no faithful servant. He dreams of the day his sorcery will overtake Shao Kahn's, and he'll pay any price to get there.

70050000011729.name: Nightwolf
70050000011729.description: Every generation, the Great Spirit chooses a worthy warrior to become Nightwolf: the Matoka's champion and protector. Grey Cloud proved worthy when he laid down his life to prevent the Black Dragon from plundering what remained of his tribe's sacred artifacts. As Nightwolf, Grey Cloud possesses extraordinary magic granted by the Great Spirit. He uses it not only to fight for the Matoka's future, but also to defend all of Earthrealm.

70050000011730.name: Terminator T-800
70050000011730.description: The Terminator T-800 from "Terminator: Dark Fate" is a cyborg assassin, sent back in time from a post-apocalyptic future. He is nearly indestructible and possesses superior technology, fighting skills and artificial intelligence making him the ultimate killing machine.

70050000011731.name: Sindel
70050000011731.description: The former Queen of Edenia will stop at nothing to keep her place. When threatened with the loss of her throne when Shao Kahn conquered her realm, Sindel betrayed her husband, and her people, to keep her privileged position. Now Shao Kahn's wife and Queen of Outworld, she enjoys power and wealth beyond most people's imagination. Good luck to anyone who tries to take it from her.

70050000011732.name: The Joker
70050000011732.description: Unpredictable, violent and incredibly dangerous, The Joker is chaos personified. He's killed a Robin, crippled Batgirl and tortured and murdered countless people throughout the DC universe. And now, he's the latest Kombatant to join in Mortal Kombat.

70050000011733.name: Spawn
70050000011733.description: Al Simmons, once the U.S. government's greatest soldier and most effective assassin, was mercilessly executed by his own men. Resurrected from the ashes of his own grave in a flawed agreement with the powers of darkness, Simmons is reborn as a creature from the depths of Hell. A Hellspawn. Now he is thrust into the world of Mortal Kombat, where he will fight for supremacy against all Kombatants.

70050000011734.name: Klassic Arcade Ninja Skin Pack 1
70050000011734.description:
This item is already included in the Kombat Pack.

Three new character skins. The Klassic Arcade Ninja Skin Pack outfits Mortal Kombat 11 characters Scorpion, Sub-Zero and Noob Saibot in Klassic, Arcade inspired costumes.

70050000011735.name: Klassic Arcade Fighter Pack
70050000011735.description:
This item is already included in the Kombat Pack.

Three new character skins. The Klassic Arcade Fighter Pack outfits Mortal Kombat 11 characters Jax, Kung Lao and Kano in Klassic, Arcade inspired costumes.

70050000011736.name: Double Feature Skin Pack
70050000011736.description:
This item is already included in the Kombat Pack.

Three new character skins. The Double Feature Skin Pack includes Cyborg Hunter Sonya Blade, Cash Machine Kano and Red Carpet Johnny Cage.

70050000011737.name: Gothic Horror Skin Pack
70050000011737.description:
This item is already included in the Kombat Pack.

Three new character skins. The Gothic Horror Skin Pack includes Goddess of the Damned Cetrion, Kronika's Monster Geras, and Impaler Raiden.

70050000011738.name: DC Elseworlds Skin Pack
70050000011738.description:
This item is already included in the Kombat Pack.

Three new character skins. The DC Elseworlds Skin Pack delivers DC Comics inspired versions of Mortal Kombat characters including Darkest Knight Noob Saibot, Killer Krok Baraka and Katwoman of Outworld Kitana.

70050000011739.name: Matinee Skin Pack
70050000011739.description:
This item is already included in the Kombat Pack.

Three new character skins. The Matinee Skin Pack includes Osh-Tekk Vandal Kotal Kahn, Swashbuckler Erron Black, and Space Marine Jacqui Briggs.

70050000011740.name: Galactic Adventures Character & Level Pack
70050000011740.description:
Go beyond the movie and enjoy more galactic adventures with General Mayhem and Rex Dangervest! After the Justice League's ship was destroyed, General Mayhem must find and take them to the Spa Planet. With The Queen's wedding plans in disarray, General Mayhem must complete her mission and return to The Queen's Palace to get the ceremony back on track.

Meet Rex Dangervest before he becomes the Cowboy, Space Pirate, Archaelogist, Raptor trainer that we meet in the film. As he prepares to become a galactic legend, he must tame and train the wild and uncontrollable Raptors. From skateboarding to weapons training and spaceship repair, Rex needs to get his crew in Ship-shape if he wants to meet Emmet.

70050000011968.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Skullscream Starship Pack
70050000011968.description:
The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Skullscream Starship Pack* includes: 
-One digital Skullscream Starship
-One digital Rankor Pilot
-One digital Tidal Wave weapon

Tidal Wave clears a path, throwing enemies into the air with short-range, widespread blasts.

Skullscream's wings provide even more speed to help you blast past everyone else.

Rankor's Pilot Ability, Rampage, comes in handy in a tight crowd. Deal extra damage as you resist incoming damage.

This Starship Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play.

70050000011969.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Vigilance Starship Pack
70050000011969.description:
The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Vigilance Starship Pack* includes: 
-One digital Vigilance Starship
-One digital Galla Joust Pilot
-One digital Jaunt weapon

Jaunt projects an intense stasis field around its user, allowing you to ram into enemy ships and launch them into the distance.

Absorb additional damage with the Vigilance starship's defensive wing.

Galla's Pilot Ability, EMP, stuns targets, making them momentarily defenseless.

This Starship Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play.

70050000011970.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Vantage Starship Pack
70050000011970.description:
The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Vantage Starship Pack* includes: 
-One digital Vantage Starship
-One digital Fern Pilot
-One digital Ice Mine weapon

Use Ice Mines to freeze groups of enemies in place and shatter them with a slam.

Vantage is built with energy wings to bring heavy firepower when in a fight.

Fern's Pilot Ability, Biosphere, unleashes the power of nature to defeat foes.

This Starship Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play.

70050000011971.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Haywire Pilot Pack
70050000011971.description:
This Pilot Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

Haywire is a reprogrammed Legion probe extremely loyal to Mason and the Equinox crew.

Hack enemy units to temporarily turn them into allies with Hack Override, Haywire's unique Pilot Ability.

This pack includes one digital Haywire Pilot.* 

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas Game required to play.

70050000011972.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Gauss Gun Weapon Pack
70050000011972.description:
The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Gauss Gun Weapon Pack* includes: 
-One digital Gauss Gun weapon
-One digital Volcano Mk.2 weapon

Gauss Gun fires with great precision, allowing pilots to aim at enemy weak points for critical damage.

Volcano Mk.2 uses heat blasts to precisely hit enemy targets.

This Weapon Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play.

70050000011973.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Fury Cannon Weapon Pack
70050000011973.description:
The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Fury Cannon Weapon Pack* includes: 
-One digital Fury Cannon weapon
-One digital Imploder Mk.2 weapon

Fury Cannon scorches everything (including structures) with fiery explosive rockets. 

Imploder Mk.2 pulls groups of enemies into deadly vortexes that cause devastating damage.

This Weapon Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play.

70050000011974.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Freeze Ray Weapon Pack
70050000011974.description:
The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Freeze Ray Weapon Pack* includes: 
-One digital Freeze Ray weapon
-One digital Levitator Mk.2 weapon

Freeze Ray charges and releases a high-precision laser that encases targets in ice.

Levitator Mk.2 homing siege missiles trap your enemies in stasis and deal huge damage.

This Weapon Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play.

70050000011975.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Meteor Weapon Pack
70050000011975.description:
The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Meteor Weapon Pack* includes: 
-One digital Meteor weapon
-One digital Nullifier Mk.2 weapon

Meteor projects an intense field of heat around its user, allowing you to ram into enemies for maximum destruction.

Nullifier Mk.2 homing missiles trap enemies in a gravity vortex.

This Weapon Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play.

70050000011976.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Startail Pilot Pack
70050000011976.description:
This pack includes one digital Startail Pilot.* 

Recruit this demolition expert to your team and utilize her explosive personality.

Startail is a ticking time bomb with a mysterious past. She spins her tale across Atlas to build her legend.

This Pilot Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 2 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!* 

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas Game required to play.

70050000011988.name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas Digital Star Fox Team Pilot Pack
70050000011988.description:
Add the rest of the Star Fox crew to your team with Falco, Peppy, and Slippy.

Falco is a hotshot flyboy who launches explosive Smart Bombs to blast away the enemy

Peppy is the grizzled veteran who glances off attacks with his defensive maneuvers

Slippy is the plucky inventor whose viral attack creates mayhem on the battlefield

70050000012120.name: 【Costume】Erdrick's Armor and Helmet
70050000012120.description: This DLC contains Erdrick's Armor and Helmet.

70050000012121.name: 【Costume】Martial Artist Gi and Wig
70050000012121.description: This DLC contains the Martial Artist Gi and Wig.

70050000012122.name: 【Costume】Veronica's Outfit and Hat
70050000012122.description: This DLC contains the Veronica Outfit and Hat.

70050000012123.name: 【Costume】Slime Hat
70050000012123.description: This DLC contains the Slime Hat.

70050000012124.name: 【Costume】Team Rocket Outfit and Hat
70050000012124.description: This DLC contains the Team Rocket Outfit and Hat.

70050000012125.name: 【Costume】Goemon Outfit and Wig
70050000012125.description: This DLC contains the Goemon Outfit and Wig.

70050000012202.name: Block DLC 1
70050000012202.description:
Game modes included are: 
• CPU Battle – Play Tetris 99 offline against 98 CPU players
• Marathon – Challenge yourself in this offline mode to clear the most lines and score big

70050000012203.name: Block DLC 2
70050000012203.description:
Game modes included are: 

• 2P Share Battle – pass a Joy-Con controller to a friend for a two-player game against each other and the CPU

• Local Arena – Up to 8 players can get together in person to battle via local wireless multiplayer (additional games and systems required; sold separately)

70050000012521.name: Hotto Stuff Pack
70050000012521.description: This pack includes more than 40 recipes to design and decorate structures that look similar to The Hotto Steppe – a popular resting area in a distant land where visitors take a sweat break from their weary travels. You’ll also get access to an additional island to gather material that you’ll need to build these recipes!

70050000012527.name: Aquarium Pack
70050000012527.description: The world of DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS 2 has become your oyster! Check the mailbox in your Isle of Awakening to discover that a fishing island awaits you with a net full of quests and characters to meet. Learn how to catch 40 different fish that can be added to your own DIY aquarium. Unlock an additional tool – the fishing rod – recipes, as well as customization options, including swimwear, straw hats, and ponytail hairstyle.

70050000012530.name: Modernist Pack
70050000012530.description: This pack includes more than 70 different recipes to construct modern-looking structures, or change hairstyles and clothing. Take your architectural skills to the next level and try your hand at building a fashionable luxury hotel.

70050000012559.name: Knickknack Pack
70050000012559.description: This pack includes 3 recipes to create a Pretty Paddle, Celebratory Soup, and Ornate Adornment so that you can celebrate every New Year with some Hotto flair!

70050000012570.name: Designer’s Sunglasses
70050000012570.description:
Receive the following in-game items when you purchase DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS 2 Season Pass:
designer's sunglasses

70050000012571.name: stackable slime
70050000012571.description:
Receive the following in-game items when you purchase DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS 2 + Season Pass Bundle: 
stackable slime

70050000012782.name: MARVEL ULTIMATE ALLIANCE 3: The Black Order Expansion Pass
70050000012782.intro: The Fantastic Four join the alliance!
70050000012782.description:
Expand your adventure and roster of playable characters in the MARVEL ULTIMATE ALLIANCE 3: The Black Order game with the paid Expansion Pass, which grants access to three exclusive DLC packs that will become available as they release one at a time after the game’s launch and will not be available for individual purchase. 

■DLC 1 – Marvel Knights: Curse of the Vampire

Prepare to step into the boots of Punisher, Blade, Moon Knight, and Morbius—the Marvel Knights are joining the alliance! These playable characters are part of DLC Pack 1 included with the MARVEL ULTIMATE ALLIANCE 3: The Black Order Expansion Pass*, which also includes a new mode! 

In Gauntlet Mode, up to four players** take on a frenzied series of co-op challenges in rapid succession to earn rewards. Once you’ve cleared a Gauntlet, you’ll unlock a survival-style version of it with ongoing waves of challenges. Find out how long you can last and see how your score stacks up with online*** rankings!  


■DLC 2 – X-Men: Rise of the Phoenix

Dark Phoenix, the infinitely powerful cosmic entity from one of the X-Men's greatest sagas, unleashes an era of fiery destruction! Four more X-Men join the alliance—Phoenix, Gambit, Ice Man, and Cable— with the purchase of the MARVEL ULTIMATE ALLIANCE 3: The Black Order Expansion Pass. 

Compete against friends and foes in the newly added Danger Room mode! Players compete to see who can take down enemies while being barraged by buffs and debuffs.
w

■DLC 3 - Fantastic Four: Shadow of Doom

Marvel’s First Family, the Fantastic Four—Mr. Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch, and The Thing—join the alliance with the purchase of the MARVEL ULTIMATE ALLIANCE 3: The Black Order Expansion Pass. 

Head to the kingdom of Latveria in an added storyline that pits your team of Marvel Super Heroes against the man in the iron mask himself, Doctor Doom.

70050000012795.name: Wolfenstein®: Youngblood™ Trial Edition
70050000012795.description:
"Wolfenstein: Youngblood is the first modern co-op Wolfenstein adventure.

Team up with a friend or play solo as one of BJ Blazkowicz’s twin daughters and wield a powerful arsenal of new weapons, gadgets, and abilities to liberate Paris from the Nazis."

70050000012796.name: Wolfenstein®: Youngblood™ Standard Edition
70050000012796.description:
"Wolfenstein: Youngblood is the first modern co-op Wolfenstein adventure.

Team up with a friend or play solo as one of BJ Blazkowicz’s twin daughters and wield a powerful arsenal of new weapons, gadgets, and abilities to liberate Paris from the Nazis."

70050000012797.name: Wolfenstein®: Youngblood™  Deluxe Edition
70050000012797.description:
"Wolfenstein: Youngblood is the first modern co-op Wolfenstein adventure.

Team up with a friend or play solo as one of BJ Blazkowicz’s twin daughters and wield a powerful arsenal of new weapons, gadgets, and abilities to liberate Paris from the Nazis.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

- The Buddy Pass, allowing you and a friend to play the entire game together, even if they don't own the game themselves
- The Cyborg Skin Pack"

70050000012881.name: Wolfenstein®: Youngblood™ Legacy Pack Pre-order Incentive
70050000012881.description:
"Like father, like daughters! 

Pre-order now to receive the Legacy Pack and unlock outfits and weapons used by BJ Blazkowicz, including:

- New Colossus Jacket power suit skin
- BJ's Army power suit skin
- Old Blood Pipe 
- Old Blood Knife
- WW2 Weapon Skin Set, for all ranged weapons

Wolfenstein: Youngblood launches on July 26, 2019."

70050000013005.name: Officers Academy Uniform (Byleth)
70050000013005.description: Officers Academy outfits for female and male Byleth available Day 1 (July 26th)  Remember: you’re the professor of one of the academy’s mighty houses, so why not look the part?

70050000013006.name: Side Story: Cindered Shadows
70050000013006.description:
A multiple-chapter story separate from the main game, featuring all-new additional characters, locations and battlefields.

You can start Cindered Shadows from Side Story on the title screen, regardless of your progress in the main game. You can choose from Normal or Hard difficulty (Maddening difficulty is not available). There are three save slots available for the side story, independent from those of the main game. There's also a separate autosave for the side story.
If you want to pick up from where you left off, select Continue from the title screen as normal. You can then use the ZL and ZR Buttons to toggle between the main game and side story data. 

In addition, the following content will be unlocked in the main game as you progress in the side story:
-	A new area of the Monastery to explore
*Talk to the Shifty Merchant near your personal quarters.
-	New recruitable characters in the Monastery
*These characters can only be recruited during the first part of the game.
-	Quests, activities, character classes, Paralogues involving the new characters, new support conversations, and more!
-	A new costume for Anna (the Tricky Merchant outfit) for Expansion Pass holders

70050000013007.name: Auxiliary Battle Maps
70050000013007.description:
Auxiliary battle maps and a new music option have been added.
The following auxiliary battle maps have been added:
Battle at Lake Teutates
Battle in the Forest
Battle in the Plains
Battle at the Sealed Forest
Battle at Conand Tower
Depending on your progress, one auxiliary battle map will be displayed on the battle-selection screen.
These new auxiliary battle maps will have a yellow "!" icon on the battle-selection screen. In them you will be able to obtain bullion, as well as stat-boosting items such as Ailell Pomegranate.
You will also receive more gold as a reward from these special maps.
You can challenge any map by spending one activity point.
The new music option ("Corridor of the Tempest") can be selected from "Battle Music" within "General" on the system menu while in an auxiliary battle.
You can also listen to it in the Music Library.

70050000013008.name: Additional Quests
70050000013008.description:
Released on 11/7/2019
Additional quests have been released.
Alongside the additional quests, new activities such as the sauna and feeding cats and dogs, as well as new battalions, have also been added.
While playing additional quests, a light blue icon will be shown.

70050000013009.name: New Attire
70050000013009.description:
DLC Wave 3: Released on 11/7/2019
New costumes (servants wear, summer attire, evening wear) have been released.
These can be worn by both the protagonist and their students. Costumes can be changed via your Journal in the Monastery.

First set
New attire (Glasses for the protagonist, House Loungewear) has been released.
House Loungewear is for the protagonist and for student characters. It can be changed into from your Personal Quarters and will only be displayed in battle for certain classes. The classes for which the attire will be displayed in battle change depending on the character. Additionally, the attire change will not display for characters sent out as travelers.
The Glasses for the protagonist are an accessory that can be combined with any other outfit. The accessory can be selected from your Personal Quarters. If equipped, Glasses will be displayed on your player character at the monastery and in battle.

70050000013066.name: Additional Support Items
70050000013066.description:
Support items (Sacred Items Set) have been released. You can receive the Sacred Items Set by selecting "DLC Supplies" near your bed in your Personal Quarters.
(The items can be received for every save file that has not already received them.)
Set contents:
　　Sacred Galewind Shoes (movement +2)
　　Sacred Floral Robe (max HP +7)
　　Sacred Snowmelt Drop (strength +3)
　　Sacred Moonstone (speed +3)

70050000013781.name: My Nintendo Gear Set
ratingContent: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
70050000013781.description:
This is a set of four in-game gear items. You can receive:

•	Gray FA-11 Bomber
•	Brown FA-11 Bomber
•	Red V-Neck Limited Tee
•	Green V-Neck Limited Tee

70050000014024.name: Spirit Board Challenge Pack 1 -Challenge various Spirits!-
70050000014024.description:
This is bonus content only available for active Nintendo Switch Online members. These items can be downloaded and used from the Spirit Mode in Super Smash Bros.™ Ultimate.

1. 1500SP
2.  Shuffle All x 10
3.  All Primaries x 10
4.  All Supports x 10

70050000014061.name: Horizon Chase Turbo - Summer Vibes
70050000014061.intro: [THIS DLC IS FOR THE DIGITAL VERSION OF HORIZON CHASE TURBO - FOR THE PHYSICAL VERSION, PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT THROUGH THE GAME ON "CAMPAIGNS MENU"]
70050000014061.description:
Summer Vibes is HORIZON CHASE TURBO first DLC. Featuring the most classic  arcades roadster, you'll love to put your sunglasses and feel every mile of this warm coast to coast experience. 

THE MOST CLASSIC ARCADE CONVERTIBLE
Player starts with an exclusive new car: a tribute to the most classic convertible roadster. And 5 amazing unlockable skins. 

12 COLORFUL SUMMER ROADS
A set of 12 Sunny Roads hand picked from the main campaign and redesigned for this Summer experience. Except for the first, you must unlock all other races. 

A COAST TO COAST LOVELY TRIP
Start in larger Coastal cities, venture through the desert roads and countryside and finish your journey in the beach. Can you feel the wind in your face?
Summer Vibes is a tribute to the Classics and, mostly, a homage to you. Have fun!

70050000014761.name: Civilization VI Expansion Pack
70050000014761.intro: Build Your Greatest Empire on Nintendo Switch™
70050000014761.description:
Sid Meier’s Civilization VI Expansion Bundle, which combines both Rise and Fall and Gathering Storm expansions, takes the turn-based strategy classic to new heights. With 16 new civilizations, 18 new leaders, and major enhancements to gameplay such as Great Ages and an active planet where geology and climatology present unique new challenges, the pursuit of building the greatest empire becomes as exciting as it has ever been in the Civilization franchise.

The Civilization VI Expansion Bundle contains all features from the Rise and Fall and Gathering Storm expansions, that includes: 

•NEW LEADERS AND CIVS: Combined together, sixteen new civilizations and eighteen new leaders are introduced. Each brings unique bonuses and gameplay, as well as unique units, districts, wonders, buildings, and more. 

•GREAT AGES: As your civilization ebbs and flows and you reach milestone Historic Moments, you will move towards Dark Ages or Golden Ages, each providing specific challenges or bonuses based on your actions in game. Rise triumphantly from a Dark Age, and your next Golden Age will be even stronger – a Heroic Age.

•LOYALTY: Cities now have individual Loyalty to your leadership – let it fall too low, and face the consequences of low yields, revolts, and the potential to lose your city if it declares its own independence. But one civilization’s loss can be your gain as you inspire Loyalty among cities throughout the map and further expand your borders.

•GOVERNORS: Recruit, appoint, and upgrade powerful characters with unique specialization bonuses and promotion trees to customize your cities, and reinforce Loyalty.

•ENHANCED ALLIANCES: An enhanced alliances system allows players to form different types of alliances and build bonuses over time.

•EMERGENCIES: When a civilization grows too powerful, other civilizations can join a pact against the threatening civilization, and earn rewards, or penalties, when the Emergency ends.

•TIMELINE: Review your civilization’s history at any time with the new Timeline feature, a visual journey through the Historic Moments that you encountered on your path to victory. 

•ENVIRONMENTAL EFFECTS: Volcanoes, storms (blizzards, sandstorms, tornados, hurricanes), climate change, floods, and droughts bring the world to life in a brand-new way. Your settlement choices are more important than ever as you balance high risks and high rewards. 

•POWER AND CONSUMABLE RESOURCES: Strategic resources play an additional role. These resources are now consumed in power plants to generate electricity for your cities. Initially you’ll be powering your most advanced buildings by burning carbon-based resources like Coal and Oil, but renewable energy sources also unlock as you progress to current-day technologies. Your choices about resource usage will directly affect the world’s temperature and can cause melting ice caps and rising sea levels. 

•ENGINEERING PROJECTS: Shape the world around your empire to overcome unfavorable land conditions by making improvements like canals, dams, tunnels and railroads. When settling cities, consider the flood risk to coastal lowland areas, but keep in mind that in the late-game, new technologies like Flood Barriers can be used to protect these tiles.

•WORLD CONGRESS: Make your voice heard among the other leaders of the world. Earn Diplomatic Favor through Alliances, influencing city-states, competing in World Games, and more. Use Diplomatic Favor to extract promises from other leaders, vote on Resolutions, call a Special Session to address an emergency, and increase the weight of your votes in your quest to achieve the new Diplomatic Victory. 

•21st CENTURY TECHNOLOGIES & CIVICS: A new era has been added to the Technology and Civics trees. Combat new environmental effects with speculative ideas such as relocating your population out to seasteads and developing technologies to recapture carbon emissions.

70050000016805.name: Minecraft Dungeons: Jungle Awakens
70050000016805.description:
A source of unbelievable power has crash-landed among the twisting vines of a distant,
dangerous jungle. This mysterious power has spread its influence through vile vines, and now
new terrors bloom – such as the Leapleaf and Whisperer. Trek through three new missions that
will take you to the heart of the jungle where you’ll find new weapons, armour, and artifacts. This
journey is meant for the bravest of heroes, for all twisted vines and paths lead to the source of
corruption: the Jungle Abomination. This beast must be dealt with to restore balance to the
jungle, so strike true and move swiftly.
FEATURES
- Fight through 3 new missions.
- Battle the Leapleaf and Whisperer.
- Take on the Jungle Abomination.
- New weapons, armour, and artifacts.

70050000016806.name: Minecraft Dungeons: Creeping Winter
70050000016806.description:
"A creeping winter is slowly taking over everything it touches, and the source of its chilling power
is a powerful creature known as the Wretched Wraith. To stop the never-ending winter in its icy
tracks, a noble hero must take on new missions in the lands trapped below zero. It won’t just be
wintry winds that seek to throw the hero from their path to destroy the Wretched Wraith, but new
enemies such as the Illusioner and Iceologer will join the brawl! As you hunt down the source of
corruption, you’ll discover new armour, weapons, and artifacts below the snow and sleet. Stay
cool and keep a steady hand, for the frost is unforgiving."

70050000017101.name: Space Costume
70050000017101.description: Purchase this title before 9pm PST on November 7, 2019 and receive Lucky's Space Suit costume!

70050000017261.name: Wargroove: Double Trouble
70050000017261.intro: Team up and lead the Outlaw faction to strategic victory, with new criminal Commanders in Wargroove: Double Trouble!
70050000017261.description:
Grab a fellow ruffian, set up your Hideout and take on Wargroove: Double Trouble. Designed with co-op play in mind, this expansion adds a new story campaign that introduces Outlaw Commanders; the mighty Wulfar, troublemaker twins Errol and Orla, as well as the maleficent Vesper.

It won’t be easy, but at least you’ll have two new units at your command - Thieves and Riflemen! Take tactical advantage of these new recruits, sending forth your Thief to ransack enemy gold and carefully positioning your Rifleman to take out enemy troops.

Introduces:
> Brand new Co-Op Story Campaign (can be played couch co-op, online co-op or even solo)
> 3 New Roguish Commanders
> 2 New Units - Thieves & Riflemen
> New Arcade missions
> Competitive online Quick Play maps
> Public and Private Multiplayer Lobbies
> Custom maps now playable online
> New Volcano map theme and more updates to the custom Editor tools
> Outlaw music tracks, composed by Phonetic Hero
> And much more!

70050000018086.name: Horizon Chase Turbo - Rookie Series
70050000018086.intro: A new campaign tailored for new players. Bring your friends and family together into ROOKIE SERIES!
70050000018086.description:
HORIZON CHASE TURBO ROOKIE SERIES DLC
A new campaign tailored for new players. Bring your friends and family together into ROOKIE SERIES!

THE ROOKIE SERIES CAMPAIGN
The new campaign is directed at young and inexperienced players, as it will teach the game basics in a welcoming environment, where they can evolve at their own pace. With no leaderboards, collectible coins nor fuel management, the DLC lets players focus on learning the main aspects of racing.

A PERFECT CAR FOR BEGINNERS
Rookie, a brand new car that is perfect for players who don’t have much experience with racing games. It offers great handling and receives automatic upgrades as the player progresses in the campaign.

THE DRIVER LICENSE
When the players reach the end of Rookie Series, they’ll unlock a special Driver’s License, that ensures they’re ready for World Tour and other gaming modes.

70050000018125.name: Swimsuit Day
70050000018125.description: Who says the beach party has to end when summer does? Visit the Order Symbol and use Prince or Princess Points to change the marriage candidates' default outfits to swimsuits.

70050000018551.name: Luigi’s Mansion™ 3 Multiplayer Pack 1
70050000018551.intro: Scare in Style with New Outfits and Minigames
70050000018551.description: Something’s lurking in the halls of the ScareScraper, it’s…Groovigi!? A disco-themed outfit for ScareScraper is joined by the Mummigi and The Green Knight costumes in the Luigi’s Mansion 3 Multiplayer Pack 1, which is the first of two packs in the Luigi’s Mansion 3 Multiplayer Pack DLC. Each of these frighteningly fabulous costumes also comes with a matching Floor Theme and themed ghosts. When you aren’t scaling the ScareScraper in style, go head-to-head in the new Tricky Ghost Brawl, Dodge Brawl, and River Bank minigames for ScreamPark!

70050000018552.name: Luigi’s Mansion™ 3 Multiplayer Pack 2
70050000018552.intro: Scare in Style with New Outfits and Minigames
70050000018552.description: Even more flashy fun is coming to the ScareScraper! This time, Cap’n Weegee, The Amazing Luigi, and Paleontoluigist (yes, Paleontoluigist) costumes are available! Play ScareScraper to see the matching floor themes and themed ghosts based on each of these spooky-yet-stylish costumes. ScreamPark is also getting three new attractions—PuckStravaganza, Floaty Frenzy, and Desperate Measures.

70050000018560.name: Another Episode Pack
70050000018560.description: This downloadable content adds illustrated stories for all 12 marriage candidates, fully voiced in English and Japanese. View them by selecting Another Episode from the title menu.

70050000018587.name: Rabite Adornment
70050000018587.description: The "Rabite Adornment" is in-game gear for your character. When equipped, this special accessory increases the amount of EXP earned in battle until your character reaches level 10.

70050000018625.name: 【Costume】Cuphead Outfit and Hat
70050000018625.description: This DLC contains the Cuphead Outfit and Hat.

70050000018626.name: 【Costume】Altaïr Outfit and Hood
70050000018626.description: This DLC contains the Altaïr Outfit and Hood.

70050000018627.name: 【Costume】Rabbids Hat
70050000018627.description: This DLC contains the Rabbids Hat.

70050000018628.name: 【Costume】X's Armor and Helmet
70050000018628.description: This DLC contains the X's Armor and Helmet.

70050000018629.name: 【Costume】MegaMan.EXE's Armor and Helmet
70050000018629.description: This DLC contains the MegaMan.EXE's Armor and Helmet.

70050000018762.name: The Isle of Armor
70050000018762.description:
There are two new areas to explore in the Galar region, and The Isle of Armor is the first area included in the Pokémon Sword™ Expansion Pass. This island is full of beautiful landscapes—beaches, bogs, forests, and more—that can be explored seamlessly like the Wild Area. And of course, you’ll find Pokémon that you couldn’t previously find in Galar dwelling there, too! In this story focused on growth, you’ll study under a former Champion, Mustard, and train alongside the new Legendary Pokémon Kubfu. What Pokémon, people, and challenges will you find on the Isle of Armor? 

The fighting-type Kubfu you receive from Mustard can fight by your side and even evolve into one of two forms. Not only can this newly discovered Pokémon Gigantamax—the Rillaboom, Cinderace, or Inteleon in your party will also be able to Gigantamax! You’ll need the extra power when battling Klara, a poison-type Trainer also studying under Mustard’s tutelage. You can discover these new people, places, Pokémon, and more on The Isle of Armor! Keep the adventure going with your existing Pokémon Sword save data and jump into this new expansion to Pokémon Sword! Your Galar adventure just got even bigger!

70050000018763.name: The Crown Tundra
70050000018763.description:
A new area, the Crown Tundra

The Crown Tundra expansion is set in the snow-swept realm of the Crown Tundra. Take a look at this vast landscape, with its drifts of glittering snow! In this frigid area with jagged, snowy mountains, people have settled in a small, tight-knit community. You'll be tasked with investigating the reaches of this frozen land—including the depths of a Pokémon Den, something you've only been able to catch a glimpse of during Max Raid Battles…until now!

Newly discovered Pokémon

Many Pokémon that didn’t appear in the Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield games make their homes on the Crown Tundra. Get ready to meet a lively array of diverse Pokémon, from newly discovered Legendary Pokémon, including Calyrex, Regieleki, Regidrago, Galarian Articuno, Galarian Zapdos, and Galarian Moltres, and new regional forms, including Galarain Slowking. You’ll also see familiar Pokémon that have been known to live in other regions!

New characters 

Upon arriving in the Crown Tundra, you’ll encounter Peony, who has brought his daughter along on an adventure to find the truth behind tales of Legendary Pokémon in the area. Shortly after your adventure begins, Peony will appoint you as the leader of his exploration team. We hope you’re looking forward to meeting new faces in this new area!

New co-op play feature

In Dynamax Adventures, you'll team up with other Trainers* to enter and explore Pokémon Dens found on the Crown Tundra where Dynamax Pokémon are said to lurk! Deep inside these dens, you’ll have a chance to encounter Legendary Pokémon from previous Pokémon series games. Work together with other Trainers to get as far as you can!

New clothing items

There will be over one hundred new clothing items added in The Isle of Armor and The Crown Tundra. Spice up your adventure by changing your look with your favorite items!

New Galarian Star Tournament!

Pick a partner from among the many Trainers you’ve met throughout your adventures in Pokémon Sword or Pokémon Shield—as well as the Expansion Pass—and team up for a Multi Battle tournament!

Note: For more details on the additional content, please check the Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield Expansion Pass official site: www.Pokemon.com/SwordShieldEX

*Additional games and systems required for multiplayer mode. Sold separately.

70050000018781.name: The Isle of Armor
70050000018781.description:
There are two new areas to explore in the Galar region, and The Isle of Armor is the first area included in the Pokémon Shield™ Expansion Pass. This island is full of beautiful landscapes—beaches, bogs, forests, and more—that can be explored seamlessly like the Wild Area. And of course, you’ll find Pokémon that you couldn’t previously find in Galar dwelling there, too! In this story focused on growth, you’ll study under a former Champion, Mustard, and train alongside the new Legendary Pokémon Kubfu. What Pokémon, people, and challenges will you find on the Isle of Armor? 

The fighting-type Kubfu you receive from Mustard can fight by your side and even evolve into one of two forms. Not only can this newly discovered Pokémon Gigantamax—the Rillaboom, Cinderace, or Inteleon in your party will also be able to Gigantamax! You’ll need the extra power when battling Avery, a psychic-type Trainer also studying under Mustard’s tutelage. You can discover these new people, places, Pokémon, and more on The Isle of Armor! Keep the adventure going with your existing Pokémon Shield save data and jump into this new expansion to Pokémon Shield! Your Galar adventure just got even bigger!

70050000018808.description:
